item.title: Mentioned by Canada NewsWire (press release)
item.description:
Member of Parliament Devinder Shory Participates in National Peacekeepers ...
11, 2013 /CNW/ - On behalf of the Honourable Julian Fantino, Minister of Veterans Affairs, Devinder Shory, Member of Parliament for Calgary Northeast, today joined members of the Canadian Association of Veterans in United Nations Peacekeeping at Peacekeeper Park to mark National Peacekeepers' Day. ... "Today, we pay tribute to the Canadian men and women who have put their lives on the line to defend and restore peace around the world through their selfless dedication and courage," said MP Shory.

item.description:
Tory MP lashes out over opposition delays on bill to strip terrorists of citizenship
... at one point Monday. Tilson cut off opposition and government MPs at various times during the marathon gabfest. Delays have prevented the committee from seeking Commons permission for a 30-day extension to consider Tory MP Devinder Shory's bill.
